recipe.title: Vanilla Brown Sugar Syrup
ingredients: 1/4 cup strained fresh pineapple juice, squeezed with your hands from pineapple rind (reserved from topping for pecan waffles )
instructions: Halve vanilla bean and scrape seeds into a 2-quart heavy saucepan, then add pod and remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stirring until sugar is dissolved, then boil until syrupy and reduced to about 1 1/3 cups, about 20 minutes. Cool to warm and discard vanilla bean pod.
